Text: Bandanna (opera):  The libretto is by Irish poet Paul Muldoon based on a treatment co-written with the composer.

Triplets:<Paul Muldoon
2:
--------------------
Text: Bandanna (opera):  The story of the Venetian Moor is recast and updated to 1968 by combining elements of the original Venetian story, William Shakespeare's "Othello", Giuseppe Verdi's opera "Otello", and new, original characters and situations.
Triplets:<Bandanna
3:
--------------------
<Text: Bandanna (opera):  The opera's unifying concept is the idea of the borderlines between emotional, metaphysical and moral states.>
Triplets:<Bandanna (opera)
